source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_000<tab>Do you have a request for the Facet of Fishing? To be honest, we're having trouble filling orders, so I don't think we'll be able to help you at present. Sorry!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_000<tab>え、ええと……！
漁業科になにかご用でしょうか……！？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Frithrik's esteem for you has grown.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>依頼品を納品したことで、
フリスリックはあなたの貢献を実感し始めました。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Deliver the items Frithrik needs, and deliver them often to improve your standing with the Facet of Fishing!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>今後も積極的に依頼品の納品を行い、
貢献度を蓄積させていきましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_030<tab>Many fishers avoid waters known to contain eighteyes eels, like the Rift of Sighs, but the nutritional benefits they offer are worth the risk. And by that, I mean “the risk of them cutting holes in your flesh and drinking your blood.”
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_030<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687A01 /var>」は、
レイクランドの「風化した裂け目」で釣れます！
見た目は怖いけど、すごく栄養のある魚みたいですよ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_050<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_055<tab>I say! This one must have been quite the bloodthirsty glutton─in a very literal sense─before you managed to reel it in!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_055<tab>立派な「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687A01 /var>」……！　ありがとうございます！
これなら、暗盲症の人もきっと良くなりますよ！
すぐに届けておきますね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_100<tab>Thank you for your hard work. I believe we have a sufficient number of eighteyes eels for the time being.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
<var 28 ((Item)) F2687A01 /var>を釣ってくれて、ありがとうございます！
さっそく、患者さんたちに渡しておきました！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_101<tab>I don't think I mentioned this, but the people I used to test the treatment for shadow-blindness are acquaintances of mine who work in the Cabinet of Curiosity.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_101<tab>暗盲症で苦しんでる患者さんたちっていうのは……
実は、博物陳列館で働く、司書さんなんです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_102<tab>Old books must be kept out of the light if at all possible, so not being able to see in the dark poses something of a problem.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_102<tab>あそこは本を保護するために暗くしているから、
暗盲症だと、本を探したりするのに苦労するみたいで……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_103<tab>The curators have already started eating their eels, although we'll need to wait and see if they have the desired effect.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_103<tab>魚をお渡ししたら、喜んでいましたよ！
食事の効果が出るのは、まだ少し先かもしれないけど……
珍しい魚を食べられるのは、それだけで嬉しいらしいです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_104<tab>Of course, they welcomed the chance to try something different from the usual fare caught at the Source. Not only that, they were extremely satisfied with the taste!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_104<tab>やっぱり、「始まりの湖」の魚だけじゃ、
飽きもするし、栄養も偏りますよね……。
これからも、いろんな種類の魚を食べさせてあげたいです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_105<tab>Speaking of something different, I think it's high time we had you cast your line in new waters.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_105<tab><var 28 ((Item)) F2687A01 /var>は、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが、
釣るのを手伝ってくれたから、しばらく在庫があるし……
僕はほかの病気で苦しんでる人がいないか、調べておきます。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_106<tab>Having said that, I'm still investigating which condition we should attempt to treat next. In the meantime, perhaps you could hone your skills in preparation for challenges that lie ahead!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_106<tab>食事療法で治せそうな病気があったら、
また協力をお願いすると思うので、
それまで少しだけ待っていてください……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_170<tab>Frithrik is pleased with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Fisherman's Friend<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_170<tab>漁業科の貢献ランクが上昇しました！
フリスリックはあなたの事を、
「漁業科改善の理解者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_130<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I was hoping you would stop by, for I have most welcome news!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_130<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
きてくれて、ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>The next request will be available from Frithrik upon reaching level 73 as a fisher.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>次の納品依頼は、
「漁師」がレベル73以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「フリスリック」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_150<tab>The course of eels we recommended to the curators of the Cabinet of Curiosity has done all we could have hoped for, and more. Some of them claim they can even <var 1A 02 /var>read<var 1A 01 /var> in the dark now!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_150<tab>この前釣ってくれた魚は、効果てきめんらしいですよ！
司書さんたちをはじめ、暗所で作業する人たちの間で、
噂になり始めているらしいです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_151<tab>At any rate, word of this treatment has spread throughout the city, and appears to have found its way to the ears of my compatriots in the Facet of Fishing.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_151<tab>需要があるなら、
クリスタリウムの一員として供給すべきだし……
熟練漁師たちの意識も、変わり始めるかもしれませんね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_152<tab>Unfortunately, most of them remain convinced that I'm unfit to act as their leader, so I asked the chirurgeons of Spagyrics if there are any other diseases that they have difficulty treating.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_152<tab>それと、ほかの病気で苦しんでいる人たちについてですが……
最近、スパジャイリクス医療館に、
湿疹を訴えて来館する人が多いみたいなんです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_153<tab>They say that a lot of people come to them complaining of rashes and so on. However, a few of those patients have also taken to eating all sorts of strange things, such as coal and paper!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_153<tab>しかも中には、異食症を併発して、
炭や紙を食べ始めてしまう人がいるらしくて……！
そのままじゃ、きっと別の病気にもなっちゃいます……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_154<tab>After consulting the Cabinet of Curiosity, I learned that these symptoms often occur in those who lack meat and dairy in their diets.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_154<tab>だから、異食症と湿疹の食事療法について、
博物陳列館で調べてみたんですけど……。
なんでも、肉や乳製品が不足すると出る症状らしいです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_155<tab>At first, I didn't see any way for the Facet of Fishing to help, but after a little more digging, I found that these types of food are rich in zinc.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_155<tab>となると漁業科の出番ではないと思うかもしれませんが、
実は、濃厚な味のする魚介類でも効果があるとか！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_156<tab>Do you know what else is rich in zinc? Creamy oysters!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_156<tab>そこで、僕が目をつけたのが、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687B01 /var>」という岩に似た二枚貝です。
文献によれば、シープの乳のような味がするようですね……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_157<tab>Unfortunately, they can be hard to come by unless you go all the way to Kholusia. But being the helpful sort you are, you'd be willing to go and snag some, wouldn't you?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_157<tab>「コルシア島沿岸西」で獲れるみたいなので、
調達を手伝ってもらえますか……？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_158<tab>Splendid! I'm sure the chirurgeons will be thrilled once Spagyrics is free of paper-munching patients!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_158<tab>ありがとうございます！
じゃあ僕は、スパジャイリクス医療館の治療師さんに、
話を通しておきますね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_171<tab>The Crystarium Deliveries list for Frithrik has been updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_171<tab>新たな依頼によって納品リストが更新されました。
「フリスリック」に話しかけて、確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_180<tab>It sounds like the chirurgeons can't get those oysters soon enough─the patients have taken to eating parts of Spagyrics itself. If we delay any longer, there'll be nothing left of the place!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_180<tab>スパジャイリクス医療館の治療師さんも、
「コルシア島沿岸西」で獲れる「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687B01 /var>」を、
心待ちにしているみたいです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_181<tab>While skin rashes and strange eating habits are far from life-threatening, I imagine the sufferers are at their wits' end. We must do all we can to help them!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_181<tab>湿疹や異食症は、すぐに死に至る病ではないですが……
きっと、すごく辛いですよね……。
患者さん方のためにも、頑張って調達しましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_200<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_200<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_205<tab>You certainly don't see creamy oysters like this every day! By all means, keep them coming!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_205<tab>すごくおおぶりな「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687B01 /var>」ですね！
ありがとうございます！
これならみんな、大喜びで食べてくれそう！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_230<tab>Well, that makes another shipment's worth. What say we deliver these to Spagyrics?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_230<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687B01 /var>」の調達、ありがとうございます！
これからスパジャイリクス医療館に届けにいくので、
よかったら一緒に行きませんか？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_231<tab>Hullo! We come bearing oysters!
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_231<tab>すみませーん、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687B01 /var>」を届けにきましたよー。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_232<tab>Oh, you're just in time! The patients have already eaten their way through the last batch, and were pestering us for more.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_232<tab>まぁ！　ありがとう、待っていたわ！
前に届けてくれた分と合わせて、
患者さんへの食事に出させてもらうわね。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_233<tab>This fellow was the most persistent of the lot, although he tells me he's well on the road to recovery.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_233<tab>こちらの患者さんも、食事療法の対象者なんだけど……
もう<var 28 ((Item)) F2687B01 /var>の効果がでてきているの！
漁師さんにお礼が言いたいんですって。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_PATIENTMAN00571_000_234<tab>I am, I am! Oh praise be, it's a miracle! Before I started my course of oysters, I'd eat almost anything I could get my gnashers around. Boots, candles, even a tatty old amaro brush!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_PATIENTMAN00571_000_234<tab>ああ、炭や紙が食いたくて仕方ないのは、
恥ずかしいやら、腹の具合が悪くなるやらで、
ずっと悩みの種だったんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_PATIENTMAN00571_000_235<tab>I spent goodness knows how long picking the bristles out of my teeth, and then I ate those as well! But thanks to you, I'm cured!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_PATIENTMAN00571_000_235<tab>変なものを食いたくなる衝動は収まってきたし、
湿疹もだいぶ薄くなってきたんだ。
恩に着るよ、漁師さん方。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_236<tab>Actually, the remedy is from an old book, so I think its author is the one worthy of your gratitude.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_236<tab>いいえそんな、僕はできることをしたまでで……！
それに、昔の本に書いてあったおかげだし……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_237<tab>Come now, Master Frithrik, there's no need to be so modest. As a matter of fact, you and your scholarly pursuits have become the talk of the Crystarium.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_237<tab>フリスリックさんって、
司書さんや治療師の間で、ちょっとした噂になっているのよ。
原因不明の病気を治してくれる、本の虫の漁師さん、ってね。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_238<tab>First, the curators of the Cabinet of Curiosity, and now the patients here at Spagyrics─it really is quite remarkable. I wonder, might I be so bold as to request your aid in another matter?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_238<tab>もしよかったら……
別の症状を訴える患者さんの食事療法も、
考えてもらってもいいかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_239<tab>You have my thanks. Actually, I'd like to ask whether your tomes mention any cases where dizziness is accompanied by heart palpitations. These symptoms are fairly common in isolation, but cases of them occurring together have been rare until recently.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_239<tab>ありがとう……！
実は前から、めまいや動悸を訴える患者さんが、
うちに相談しにきていてね。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_240<tab>Obviously, we tell our patients to rest as much as possible, but beyond that, there is little else we can do for them.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_240<tab>十分に休息をとってもらったり、対策はしているんだけど、
なかなか良くならなくて……。
単なる体力不足や体調不良ではなさそうなのよ……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_241<tab>Until we know what's causing it, the chances of a full recovery are slim. Please, will you look into what might be behind it?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_241<tab>私たちは、その場で対症的な治療はできるけど……
慢性的な病気は、原因から治せないと意味がないの。
だから、どうかお願いできないかしら。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_242<tab>I'll do everything in my power.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_242<tab>なるほど……。
わかりました、任せてください！
その病気と効果的な食べ物について、調べてみます！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_243<tab>This might take a while, but I have a feeling I'll be calling on your services again. Until then, keep practicing!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_243<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
効果的な食べ物の調べがついたら、改めてお伝えしますね。
その時はまた協力をお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_310<tab>Frithrik is delighted with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Piscatorial Pioneer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_310<tab>漁業科の貢献ランクが上昇しました！
フリスリックはあなたの事を、
「漁業科改善の支持者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_260<tab>I've made an incredible breakthrough!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_260<tab>あっ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
ちょうどよかった！
ちょっと話を聞いてほしいんです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_265<tab>The next request will be available from Frithrik upon reaching level 75 as a fisher.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_265<tab>次の納品依頼は、
「漁師」がレベル75以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「フリスリック」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_290<tab>The key to curing the mysterious illness lies in the brightmirror clam.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_290<tab>実は、めまいや動悸に、
効果のありそうな食べ物が見つかったんだ！
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687C01 /var>」と呼ばれる、淡水貝です！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_291<tab>Unfortunately, they are not native to the Source, so we'll have to try further afield.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_291<tab>ただ残念ながら、「始まりの湖」には生息してなくて、
レイクランド近辺では捕獲できないみたいで……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_292<tab>My tomes tell me they can be found near Longmirror Lake, once part of the Kingdom of Voeburt.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_292<tab>古い魚類図鑑によると、
かつてのフッブート王国に、
生息していたらしいことがわかったんですが……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_293<tab>These days, that whole area is part of Il Mheg, and most of us would sooner steer clear of there if we can help it.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_293<tab>あの場所はいま、
イル・メグと呼ばれる妖精たちの領域……
とてもじゃないけど、危なくて近づけません。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_294<tab>Although, considering the dangerous places you've been to thus far, I assume you're not scared of a few pixies?
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_294<tab>だから、どうしたものかと思って……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_A1_000_001<tab>Well, Feo mostly seems fine. Mostly.
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_A1_000_001<tab>自分にはフェオがついている

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_A1_000_002<tab>I ain't afraid of no gho─I mean, pixies.
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_A1_000_002<tab>妖精なんか怖くない

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_295<tab>You know Feo? Then the rumors of the traveler who befriended a pixie are actually about you. Am I right?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_295<tab>フェオ……？　ああ！
妖精と知り合いの旅人が、クリスタリウムにいるって噂は、
もしかして君のことなの！？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_296<tab>Is that so? Hmm... You wouldn't happen to be the traveler who befriended a pixie, by any chance?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_296<tab>妖精が怖くないなんて…………あっ！
妖精と知り合いの旅人が、クリスタリウムにいるって噂は、
もしかして、君のことなの……！？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_297<tab>Ha ha! You certainly are full of surprises! It seems I've found the perfect candidate to go fishing for clams in Il Mheg. There should be some in a river called “the Spoiled One,” if the rumors are true. So, are you up to the task?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_297<tab>はっ、ごめんなさい、くだけた話し方になってしまって……！
君って親切にしてくれる上にすごくて、つい……。
じゃあ、君に漁をお願いしてもいいかな？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_298<tab>I say, you seem rather confident! Those mischief-makers had better think twice before they play any tricks on you!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_298<tab>さすが、心強いよ！
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687C01 /var>」はイル・メグの、
「末の子らの流れ」という場所に生息しているらしいんだ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_299<tab>Unfortunately, I won't be able to join you on this occasion as I have...things to take care of. And no, it's not because I'm terrified of pixies! Perish the thought!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_299<tab>今回、僕は獲りに行けなくて申し訳ないけど、
どうかよろしくお願いします……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_311<tab>The Crystarium Deliveries list for Frithrik has been updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_311<tab>新たな依頼によって納品リストが更新されました。
「フリスリック」に話しかけて、確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_330<tab>I do apologize for asking you to travel into the heart of Il Mheg. If only there were a more convenient location for harvesting brightmirror clams...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_330<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687C01 /var>」の調達は順調そう？
イル・メグの「末の子らの流れ」なんて、
危険なところに行かせてごめんね……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_350<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_350<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_355<tab>Well, well! It seems like your hard work has been rewarded!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_355<tab>わぁ……！　すごく大きな「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687C01 /var>」だね！
それに身が詰まってて、ずっしり重たい……！
すぐにスパジャイリクス医療館に届けるよ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_380<tab>Your brightmirror clams are being distributed to the patients as we speak.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_380<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、どうもありがとう！
調達してくれた<var 28 ((Item)) F2687C01 /var>は、
スパジャイリクス医療館に届けておいたよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_381<tab>Oh, that's right─the chirurgeons mentioned they might be paying us a visit at some point, presumably to shower you with praise.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_381<tab>そのとき治療師さんが、僕と君に話があるから、
ちかいうちに顔を出すって言ってたんだ。
もうすぐ来るんじゃないかな？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_382<tab>Frithrik! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The clams did the trick! How can we ever repay you?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_382<tab>フリスリックさん、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
<var 28 ((Item)) F2687C01 /var>をどうもありがとう。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_383<tab>Let's not worry about all that now. The main thing is the welfare of your patients. Just a moment─is that Lobb?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_383<tab>い、いえ……！　それはいいのですが……。
後ろにいらっしゃるのは、
もしかして漁業科のロブさんでは……？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_384<tab>Yes, he's one of many who've benefited from your efforts. Until recently, he could barely stand without experiencing dizziness and palpitations. Thankfully, the treatment worked exactly as you'd predicted.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_384<tab>ええ、ロブさんは、うちの患者さんなの。
長年に渡って、めまいや動悸に悩まされていたのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_385<tab>To tell the truth, he probably would've recovered even quicker if he'd spent more time sleeping instead of constantly talking about the Facet of Fishing. Now, I don't like to pry, but I hear there has been some discontent among your members.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_385<tab>おせっかいかもしれないけど……
漁業科の不和は、彼から話を聞いて知っていたわ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_386<tab>Not to put too fine a point on it, but I thought that if a facet member were to try one of your treatments, then... Well, I'm sure you see what I'm getting at.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_386<tab>だから、あなたたちの活動の意義を、
患者であり漁師でもある、ロブさんに知ってほしくて……
それで、今回の食事療法を提案させてもらったの。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_387<tab>I'll take it from here, if you don't mind. Frithrik, I'm not one to mince my words, and I won't be starting now. When you first started spouting off about “balanced diets” and “nutritional value,” I thought it was a load of nonsense.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_387<tab>正直言って、驚いている。
忌々しい持病が、<var 28 ((Item)) F2687C01 /var>を食べ始めてから、
快方へと向かい始めているんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_388<tab>That was until the chirurgeons cajoled me into trying your methods─without my knowledge, I might add! Anyway, after a few servings of brightmirror clam, I started to notice a difference. Only then did they tell me it was all your idea, and the scales fell from my eyes.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_388<tab>あんたたちの言っていたことは、正しかったんだな……。
いままでの態度を許してくれ……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_389<tab>As much as I hate making apologies, I reckon I owe you one. I'm sorry, Frithrik. If there's anything I can do to make it up to you, just say the word.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_389<tab>詫びといってはなんだが……
これからは、食事療法のための漁を手伝わせてくれ。
<var 28 ((Item)) F2687A01 /var>や<var 28 ((Item)) F2687B01 /var>なら、俺にも獲れる。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_390<tab>Oh, it's quite all right, really! But if you're feeling up to returning to work, there are a few assignments you can help with.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_390<tab>そ、そんな……！
願ってもない申し出です！
どうか、よろしくお願いします……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_391<tab>Yes, we could use a lot more creamy oysters and brightmirror clams! And not just for Spagyrics, either.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_391<tab>スパジャイリクス医療館の治療師たちも、
困ったことがあったら、力になるわ。
いつでも呼んでちょうだいね。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_392<tab>If we can encourage the citizenry to include them in their meals, then perhaps some of the illnesses we've been treating will become a thing of the past.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SPAGYRICSHEALER00571_000_392<tab>漁業科が食事療法に力を入れてくれたら、うちも助かるもの。
クリスタリウムの人たちの病気を治すために、
お互いに協力して頑張りましょ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_393<tab>Yes, I couldn't agree more. We'll do our best to keep the shipments coming in!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_393<tab>はっ、はい……！
ありがとうざいます……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_394<tab>It's amazing to think that the knowledge in those ancient tomes could be making such a difference in this day and age. Perhaps this will add a bit more weight to my side of the argument.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_394<tab>すごい、すごいよ……！
僕たちがやってることを、
漁師の中でも認めてくれる人ができたんだ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_395<tab>Of course, if it weren't for your bravery and commitment, none of this would've been possible.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_395<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのおかげだよ！
ありがとう、ありがとう……！！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_396<tab>Now that Lobb has offered to assist us, we should be able to maintain the supply of our existing specialties while exploring new avenues. If you keep reeling in nutritious morsels, I'll see what information I can gather!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_396<tab>人手も増えたし、これなら前よりもっと、
食事療法の幅を広げられるかもしれないね！
これから、また対策を練っていこう！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_460<tab>Frithrik is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Apex Angler<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_460<tab>漁業科の貢献ランクが上昇しました！
フリスリックはあなたの事を、
「漁業科改善の支援者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_400<tab>A new quest continuing the story of the Facet of Fishing is now available. Upon its completion, the Crystarium Deliveries list for Frithrik will be updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_400<tab>また、「フリスリック」から受注可能な、
ミーン工芸館取引のストーリークエストが発行されました！
クエストをコンプリートすることで、納品リストが更新されます。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_420<tab>I've found a cure! Well, a potential cure, anyway.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_420<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、朗報があるんだ！
ロブさんのお知り合いの女性について、
病気の対策が見つかったよ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_425<tab>The next request will be available from Frithrik upon reaching level 78 as a fisher.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_425<tab>次の納品依頼は、
「漁師」がレベル78以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「フリスリック」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_450<tab>As you may recall, Lobb told us of a young lady suffering from a prolonged bout of jaundice and frequent spells of dizziness.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_450<tab>ロブさんによると、その女性は、
白目が黄色く変色していて、
めまいがひどいらしいって話だったよね。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_451<tab>Although we made an earnest attempt to retrieve the necessary information from the Cabinet of Curiosity, it was when we asked the curators for help that we finally struck gold.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_451<tab>黄疸がでる理由って、いまだによくわからないから、
文献が少なくて大変だったんだけど……
司書さんの協力もあって、スムーズに調べが進んだんだ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_452<tab>It seems that the key to overcoming such symptoms lies in the nutrition-rich fat reserves of certain fish, particularly those that spend extended periods out of water.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_452<tab>貧血と黄疸は、やっぱり栄養失調が原因みたい。
不足している栄養を補う食材については……
脂の乗った怪魚の肝、っていうのがいいんだって。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_453<tab>Now, if you think that species like that would be incredibly hard to find...you'd be right. The tomes tell of the Amber monkfish, which lurks beneath the sands of Amh Araeng, around the Hills of Amber, seeking what little moisture it can find.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_453<tab>怪魚といえば……アム・アレーンの<var 28 ((Item)) F2687D01 /var>かな。
過酷な砂海で生きるために、肝に脂肪を蓄えている魚なんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_454<tab>Fishing in a desert sounds like rather a daunting task, but I assume you're up to the challenge?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_454<tab>ただ、アム・アレーンの危険な地域に生息していて、
並の漁師じゃ生息地に向かうことすら難しくて……。
だから、君にお願いしてもいいかな？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_455<tab>I knew I could count on you!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_455<tab>ありがとう！　やっぱり君は頼りになるね！
じゃあ、また何匹か釣ってきてくれると嬉しいな。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_456<tab>If the illustrations in the books are anything to go by, they're ugly little blighters. We should probably try to catch as many as possible, though. Oh, and watch your fingers!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_456<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687D01 /var>」は、
アム・アレーンの「アンバーヒル」に生息しているから……
気をつけて行ってきてね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_461<tab>The Crystarium Deliveries list for Frithrik has been updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_461<tab>新たな依頼によって納品リストが更新されました。
「フリスリック」に話しかけて、確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_480<tab>I think it would be best to have Lobb give the fish to his friend in person, since it was his idea to help her. If you bring them to me, I'll make sure he gets them.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_480<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687D01 /var>」は、
アム・アレーンの「アンバーヒル」で釣れるよ。
君が釣ってくれたら、患者さんもロブさんも喜んでくれるはず！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_500<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_500<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_505<tab>Argh! It's a monster! I do hope that Lobb does something to make it look a little more appetizing before presenting it to his friend. For what it's worth, I don't think they come much bigger or uglier than this!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_505<tab>わあ！　すごく上質な<var 28 ((Item)) F2687D01 /var>だね！
この張り……脂が乗っているのが、一目でわかるよ！
これなら、きっとすぐに効果が出るはず！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_530<tab>I think that should be enough, we don't want her being overnourished!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_530<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
十分な数の<var 28 ((Item)) F2687D01 /var>を釣ってきてくれて、
どうもありがとう……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_531<tab>Come to think of it, I don't believe I've ever met our patient, which is not so surprising, given her condition. I take it the treatment is going well?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_531<tab>僕は患者さんと面識がないから、
ロブさんに届けてもらっていたんだ。
どうやら、経過は順調みたいだよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_532<tab>Oh yes, she's looking a lot better. Less yellow around the eyeballs, at least.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_532<tab>ああ、黄疸はかなり治まってきている。
だが………………

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_533<tab>Trouble is, even after eating all that liver, she's still as limp and lifeless as a beached jellyfish.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_533<tab>彼女は生まれもっての体質なのか……体がひどく弱くて……。
君たちのおかげで黄疸は良くなったが、
まだ具合が悪そうなんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_534<tab>She's always been a bit of a sickly child, but the chirurgeons seem to think it could be something worse, most likely crysteosis.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_534<tab>最近は、手足に力が入りにくいらしくて……。
おそらく水晶患い（すいしょうわずらい）じゃないかと、
治療師たちに言われたらしい……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_535<tab>Oh gods! I wouldn't wish that on anyone, not even Mervyl! Ahem!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_535<tab>ええっ！　水晶患いだって……！？
それは大変だ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_536<tab>Oh, I'm sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Since you're not from these parts, you've probably never heard of crysteosis.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_536<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
もしかして、水晶患いを知らないの……！？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_537<tab>Its name derives from the fact that it only affects those living in and around the Crystarium, although the exact causes are unclear. The body gradually becomes less and less responsive and can even lead to death in some cases.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_537<tab>水晶患いは、クリスタリウム特有の原因不明の病気でね。
だるさを感じたり、手足の動きが鈍くなっていって……
重症化すると、命の危険もある病気なんだ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_538<tab>There's one more thing I have to tell you. It's about the patient─she's Mervyl's daughter, Hurielle!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_538<tab>それで……その……いままで黙っていてすまなかったが……
その患者は、マーヴィルのひとり娘の、
ヒュリエルという子なんだ……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_539<tab>We all know that he's too proud to come to you, and I thought it best to keep her identity from you in case you refused to help. But her condition is a lot worse than we'd realized, so it's time to stop messing around.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_LOBB_000_539<tab>複雑な気持ちだとは思うが……
俺も、彼女が小さな頃から知っている女性なんだ。
なんとか、引き続き助けてやってもらえないか……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_540<tab>Yes, we can't allow the feud between Mervyl and myself to jeopardize Hurielle's treatment. Though I must say, Lobb, I'm rather disappointed that you thought I could be that petty! Your doubts were entirely unwarranted, I assure you.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_540<tab>もちろんです！
クリスタリウムで苦しんでいる人がいるなら、
何とかしたいと思う気持ちは、みんな同じです……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_541<tab>Now that I think about it, the day we saw Mervyl in the Cabinet of Curiosity, he must've been there to research his daughter's illness. But that was when we thought that jaundice and dizziness were the worst of her symptoms...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_541<tab>今にして思えば、マーヴィルさんが博物陳列館に来ていたのも、
娘さんの病気について、調べるためだったのかも……。
きっとあの人も、不安なんでしょうね……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_542<tab>There's only one thing for it! It's back to the books!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_542<tab>食事療法でどうにかなるか、わからないけど……
すぐに対策を調べてみましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_543<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you leave this to us.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_543<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
僕は水晶患いについて調べを進めるよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_544<tab>If there's a way to cure crysteosis through the nutrients in fish, we're sure to find it! We'll be needing your angling skills before long, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I'm certain!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_544<tab>もし食事療法で改善できるかもしれないなら、
君にも協力をお願いするかもしれない。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_545<tab>If past experience is anything to go by, we'll be sending you off to some fiend-invested bog at the arse end of─I mean, somewhere tranquil and picturesque!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_545<tab>もしかしたら、
また危険な地域に行ってもらうかもしれないから……
準備と鍛錬を十分にしておいて……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_549<tab>Frithrik is deeply moved by your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aquatic Artisan<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_549<tab>漁業科の貢献ランクが上昇しました！
フリスリックはあなたの事を、
「漁業科改善の牽引者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_550<tab>A new quest continuing the story of the Facet of Fishing is now available. Speak with Frithrik as a fisher at level 80 or above to undertake the quest.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_550<tab>ミーン工芸館取引のストーリークエストが発行されました！
「漁師」がレベル80以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「フリスリック」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_560<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_560<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_570<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! How are you?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_570<tab>やあ、遊びにきてくれたの？
君のおかげで、漁業科はすごく賑わっているよ！
みんなで協力して、いろんな地域で漁を始めているんだ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_575<tab>Things have never been better here at the Facet of Fishing. We've learned how to provide both quantity and quality, not to mention variety.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_575<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、君は幾度となく、
クリスタリウムの人たちを笑顔にしてくれて……
本当にすごいな……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_576<tab>Of course, none of this would have been possible without you. I'll do my best to follow in your fine example. You are truly a fisher's fisher!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_576<tab>僕も少しでも、君みたいになれるように……
みんなを元気にするために、もっともっと頑張るから、
どうか見ていて！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_580<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_580<tab>所持品に空きがないため、
報酬を受け取ることができません。
所持品を空けてから、フリスリックに話しかけてください。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_590<tab>In order to make deliveries, you must be a fisher.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_SYSTEM_000_590<tab>漁業科との取引を行うには、
「漁師」である必要があります。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_600<tab>Hullo there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm told Chora-Zoi's kept you rather busy with those splendorous tools. She dropped by some time ago to ask my thoughts on the project, and I was happy to oblige.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_600<tab>あ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
君はあのモーエンツールにも協力していたんだよね？
僕も漁業科を代表して、道具の意見を伝えさせてもらったんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_601<tab>A fisher is nothing without <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> equipment, as you well know. The prospect of a tool that might adapt to my very nature is not something I ever would have considered, but I'm grateful for it nonetheless.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_601<tab>僕らの仕事は道具ありきだし……
誇りを持って大事に使い続けられる道具の開発は、
とてもありがたいよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_602<tab>I imagine the fishers of Lakeland would be equally pleased to wield one of your masterpieces once mass production begins. Thank you for your hard work─it would seem we've all got a brighter future ahead of us.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER5_00571_FRITHRIK_000_602<tab>流通したら、レイクランドの漁師の皆も、
すっごく喜ぶだろうなぁ……！
